actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit the U.S. Civil Service Commission to contract with certain qualified health maintenance organizations.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States Civil Service Commission to contract for health care with qualified health maintenance organizations as determined by the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8903)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit the U.S. Civil Service Commission to contract with certain qualified health maintenance organizations.
